Digenpy

Check your wireless security

About

Digenpy is a WEP dictionary generator suitable for multiple platforms, modular, easily extendable, and currently supporting dozens of different routers from different companies.
It also generates WPA passphrase for Telefonica and Jazztel's WLAN_XXXX

Supported routers

Currently, following companies' routers are supported

  • Telefonica
  • Jazztel
  • Tele2
  • Dlink
Try it online!
Right now, only Spanish routers are available

Download

Downlad for linux

Source page on pypi

Download for windows (soon)

About

Have a look at my online CV David Francos Cuartero

This project is inspired from seguridadwireless.net's dictionary generators, trying to be a (much more) friendly place for people than theirs

Other projects

Airoscript-ng, aircrack-ng companion. In conjunction with Digenpy can test your network (in)security in minutes
